fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When visited the visitor must roll 26 d6's
If more than 16 of those are a 5 or 6 your mental state stabilizes
If not you will break out when your mental state is crazied
When you break out an announcement is made about you breaking out
When broken out, at night, attack 1 person with a powerfull attack and their neighbours with a basic one. You cannot be stopped from doing this.
Repeat till your mental state stabilizes

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Survive till the end of the game
